value:
I must say, Summoner, that there's
something about you...that I can't
quite put my finger on.$k$pI serve a master elsewhere, and
yet I find that I'm thoroughly
compelled to serve you.

I've dedicated my life to serving
my liege, Corrin. Though a butler,
I am treated almost like family.

It seems that you're too important
to deal with these pesky patrols.
Couldn't someone else do it?

I'm forever trying to master the art
of making tea, and I'm often in
desperate need of a taster.$k$pIf your taste is anywhere near as
refined as my master Corrin's,
you'd be of great help to me!

This kingdom makes such exquisite
teakettles. Prince Alfonse lent me one.
I owe him thanks for such a kindness.

I come bearing a greeting from
$Nf.$k$pNow with that done, I must get
to my next task.
Permission to celebrate?

My liege needs me to be yet
stronger.
Well, that won't do at all.

Any butler worth his salt will
master any and all abilities.

My name is Jakob. I am a Nohrian
butler, loyal to my liege, Corrin. I offer
you my service, if not my devotion.

Oh. Did you need something?
You've brought me tea?
I'm not thirsty at the moment...$k$pBut I shall drink it nonetheless.
I wouldn't want to waste tea.$k$pIt's a bit cold. And too bitter. I
would never have served it. But...
I sense the effort that went into it.$k$pRegardless of skill, there is flavor
in devotion, a taste in affection.
You thought of me in making this.$k$pNext time, I shall make the tea for
you, and it will taste better than
anything you have ever known.
せやっ
はあっ
Drat
Of all the—
Time to take out the trash.
You are excused.
I could do no less.
I'll show you the door!
Done in...
Hmmm.
Care for a cup of tea?
My master is the kindest person you could ever imagine.
Pardon my immodesty, but you see a master butler standing before you.
I dearly hope this realm grows tea plants.
I hate to carry on about my master, Corrin, but you've never met a finer person!
I keep a kettle handy to brew tea for my master, Corrin. I do hope you like tea?
I have to confess... Though I have pledged my service to my master back home, I'm drawn to serve you too.
Yes?
Your orders.
You rang?
